ValidationRule.description: Mandatory fields for contact creation for SSSW Service Agents and Unified Agents.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"SSSW - Service Agent"), $Profile.Name = 'CustomerService') && ( ISBLANK( FirstName ) || ISBLANK( LastName ) || ( ISBLANK( Phone ) && ISBLANK( HomePhone ) && ISBLANK( MobilePhone ) && ISBLANK( OtherPhone ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have not met the minimum data for a Contact. Must have a First, Last Name, Phone/Mobile. Remember to ask for an Email address
